many-to-one.name: defaultRequestSource
many-to-one.title: Default request source
many-to-one.help: This configuration only applies to interventions for active contracts generated by a batch. You can define here the default request source that will be automatically filled in when creating an intervention. Sources are configured from the Configuration/Request source menu of the Intervention module.
